patthana8.12:4.1: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:4.2: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:4.3: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokiyo ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.12:5.1: Nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:6.1: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
